item.title: EP 451 - The Melted Man
item.itunes:title: The Melted Man
item.description:
Today we call the cops and the don’t show up*, we jump haphazardly into piles of things, and then we travel to Brazil to investigate the death of a man who was burned up by a UFO!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Links:

 

Macon teacher at center of false social media post charged with solicitation of sodomy

https://www.13wmaz.com/article/news/local/verify-north-macon-cvs-carjacking-facebook-post/93-663a3ac3-22b6-44ed-8986-37bc4dbef7e2

 

Macon teacher charged with solicitation of sodomy after reporting he was robbed

https://www.ajc.com/news/national/macon-teacher-charged-with-solicitation-sodomy-after-reporting-was-robbed/HSCfmFjtjkK5E9Mt8Mp7EL/

 

Was it Satanists or a sick BBQ? Police baffled after more than 800 tails cut from cats and dogs appear in a Brazilian town

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3225623/Police-baffled-800-tails-cut-cats-dogs-appeared-Brazilian-town-not-single-local-reported-missing-pet.html

 

BURNING MAN OF BRAZIL

http://www.wormwoodchronicles.net/wormwood-files/burning-man-of-brazil

 

Araçariguama Incident

https://high-strangeness.fandom.com/wiki/Ara%C3%A7ariguama_Incident

 

Death from Above — Part One: The Horrible Melting Man

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2012/06/death-from-above-part-one-the-horrible-melting-man/

 

Morro Velho

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Morro_Velho

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Dead Rabbit Exposed By Smashers_25 (Instagram)

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Alien Garage By TVP VT U

 

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Reptilian Strip Song EP 374: “Empty Beds”

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
